name: Fear of the dark (itch) (Insomne)
description:
A short game made with TIC-80

How to play

  • Stay surrounded by light
  • If you stay in the darkness your heart rate will increase
  • Move the player using arrow keys
  • Collect fire woods to throw them at the bonfire and keep the fire burning
  • Throw the fire woods pressing Z when you're close to the bonfire
  • You die if your heart rate is above 160 Bpm or if the bonfire is no longer  burning

Thanks for playing
